This happened to me also on my previous PC. I thought it depended on that PC. Now that I have it also on my new PC I understand there is something wrong.

Obviously:

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Open any file in MS word
2.Click Send > Email


Actual Results:  
1. Nothing happens
2. When I close MS-word I get the following message:
"You cannot close Microsoft Office Word until the Send Mail command is finished. Swithc to the New Message first, and either send or close the message"
3. I need to force MS word to exit from the tasklist, otherwise it would not close
